ingredients.ingredient: 7 ½ cups seedless watermelon, chopped into chunks, divided
3 limes, juiced, or more to taste
4 tablespoons chamoy (Mexican chili fruit condiment), or more to taste  (Optional)

cookingTips: Blend watermelon until completely smooth before churning
Strain through fine mesh to remove any pulp for smooth texture
Churn in ice cream maker for 20-25 minutes for best consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through blending watermelon with sugar and lime juice, straining for smoothness, optionally adding chamoy, then churning in an ice cream maker.
